News.Title: Rkec Projects Secures Work Order Worth 1.98 Billion Rupees
News.Summary: Rkec Projects has received a work order valued at 1.98 billion rupees. The company has a market capitalization of 135 crore rupees, indicating this contract is significantly larger than its current market value.

News.Title: RKEC Projects Secures 198 Crore Rupees Work Order
News.Summary: RKEC Projects has secured a work order worth 198 crore rupees. The company's current market capitalization stands at 135 crore rupees, indicating the order value exceeds its market value.

News.Title: RKEC Projects Secures Work Order Worth 326.1 Million Rupees
News.Summary: RKEC Projects has been awarded a work order valued at 326.1 million rupees. This represents a significant new contract for the company, potentially boosting its project portfolio and revenue stream.
